001package com.technototes.library.command;
002
003import android.util.Pair;
004
005import java.util.Arrays;
006import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
007import java.util.stream.Collectors;
008
009@SuppressWarnings("unused")
010public class ChoiceCommand extends ParallelRaceGroup {
011    @SafeVarargs
012    public ChoiceCommand(Pair<BooleanSupplier, Command>... cs) {
013        super(Arrays.stream(cs)
014                .<Command>map(p -> new ConditionalCommand(p.first, p.second))
015                .collect(Collectors.toList())
016                .toArray(new Command[] {}));
017    }
018
019    public ChoiceCommand(BooleanSupplier b, Command c) {
020        this(new Pair<>(b, c));
021    }
022}
